properties.name: spring.cloud.refresh.enabled
properties.description: Enables autoconfiguration for the refresh scope and associated features.

properties.name: spring.cloud.httpclientfactories.apache.enabled
properties.description: Enables creation of Apache Http Client factory beans.

properties.name: spring.cloud.httpclientfactories.ok.enabled
properties.description: Enables creation of OK Http Client factory beans.

properties.name: spring.cloud.util.enabled
properties.description: Enables creation of Spring Cloud utility beans.

properties.name: spring.cloud.discovery.client.composite-indicator.enabled
properties.description: Enables discovery client composite health indicator.
